words.source: H559 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; all trans. agree
H413 prep. אֶל + 3mp suff. 'to them'; all trans. agree

H4714 proper name; all trans. agree
H4100 prep. l- + interrog. מָה 'why?'; KJV 'wherefore', ESV 'why', NASB 'why'
H4872 proper name; all trans. agree
H175 conj. + proper name; all trans. agree

H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H5971 def. art. + n.ms עַם 'people'; all trans. agree

H5450 prep. l- + n.fp + 2mp suff. of סְבָלָה 'burden, forced labor'; KJV 'unto your burdens', ESV 'to your burdens', NASB 'to your labors'
